languages.text: "Вам говорили когда-нибудь, какой у вас пронзительный взгляд?.." {n}Улыбка Джай гаснет.{/n} "Что ж, шерин. Этот груз особо ценен для меня, потому что прибыл издалека — из региона Безбожных звезд. От моих дальних торговых партнеров. И сами партнеры, и груз, так скажем, относятся к образцам культуры, чуждой Человечеству..."

traits.locale_text: "Вам говорили когда-нибудь, какой у вас пронзительный взгляд?.." {n}Улыбка Джай гаснет.{/n} "Что ж, не смею вам лгать, шерин. Этот груз особо ценен для меня, потому что прибыл издалека — из региона Безбожных звезд. От моих дальних торговых партнеров. И сами партнеры, и груз, так скажем, относятся к образцам культуры, чуждой Человечеству..."

languages.text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"
languages.original_text: "Вам говорили когда-нибудь, какой у вас пронзительный взгляд?.." {n}Улыбка Джай гаснет.{/n} "Что ж, шерин. Этот груз особо ценен для меня, потому что прибыл издалека — из региона Безбожных звезд. От моих дальних торговых партнеров. И сами партнеры, и груз, так скажем, относятся к образцам культуры, чуждой Человечеству..."

traits.locale_text: "Has anyone ever told you that you have such a piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, I wouldn't dream of lying to you, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From my faraway trade partners. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to humanity—"

"Has anyone ever told you that you have such a piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, I wouldn't dream of lying to you, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From my faraway trade partners. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to humanity—"

This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

"Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, I wouldn't dream of lying to you, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

"Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

languages.text: “有没有人告诉过你，说你的目光特别有洞察力？”{n}婕伊的笑容消失了。{/n}“这么说吧，亲爱的。这批货物对我而言特别有价值，因为它来自异端群星地区，来自我遥远的贸易伙伴。可以这么说，无论是我那些贸易伙伴，还是这些货物，都来自某个不属于人类的外来文明——”
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: “有没有人告诉过你，说你的目光特别有洞察力？”{n}婕伊的笑容消失了。{/n}“这么说吧，亲爱的。这批货物对我而言特别有价值，因为它来自异端群星地区，来自我遥远的贸易伙伴。可以这么说，无论是我那些贸易伙伴，还是这些货物，都来自某个不属于人类的外来文明——”

languages.text: «¿Alguna vez te ha dicho alguien que tienes una mirada increíblemente penetrante?». {n}La sonrisa de Jae se desvanece.{/n} «Este cargamento posee un gran valor para mí porque vino de lejos, de la región de las Estrellas Paganas, de manos de unos asociados míos. Tanto ellos como el cargamento son, digamos, de una cultura foránea a la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Alguna vez te ha dicho alguien que tienes una mirada increíblemente penetrante?». {n}La sonrisa de Jae se desvanece.{/n}Este cargamento posee un gran valor para mí porque vino de lejos, de la región de las Estrellas Paganas, de manos de unos asociados míos. Tanto ellos como el cargamento son, digamos, de una cultura foránea a la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「イヤになるほど視線がキツイって言われたことない？」{n}ジェイから笑顔が消える。{/n}「そうね、シャリーン。この貨物はあたしにとって特別に大事な子。だってこの子は遠くから来たんだもの…異教に歌われし星々からよ。あたしの遠方の貿易相手から届いたの。相手も積荷も、言うなれば、人類にとっては外部の文化ね…」
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: 「イヤになるほど視線がキツイって言われたことない？」{n}ジェイから笑顔が消える。{/n}「そうね、シャリーン。この貨物はあたしにとって特別に大事な子。だってこの子は遠くから来たんだもの…異教に歌われし星々からよ。あたしの遠方の貿易相手から届いたの。相手も積荷も、言うなれば、人類にとっては外部の文化ね…」

languages.text: "Hat Euch schon mal jemand gesagt, dass Ihr einen extrem stechenden Blick habt?" {n}Jaes Lächeln verblasst.{/n} "Nun gut, Shereen. Diese Fracht ist für mich besonders wertvoll, weil sie von weither kommt – aus der Region der Sterne der Ungläubigen. Ich habe dort Handelspartner. Sowohl die Partner als auch die Fracht entstammen, sagen wir, einer Kultur, die der Menschheit fremd ist ..."
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: "Hat Euch schon mal jemand gesagt, dass Ihr einen extrem stechenden Blick habt?" {n}Jaes Lächeln verblasst.{/n} "Nun gut, Shereen. Diese Fracht ist für mich besonders wertvoll, weil sie von weither kommt – aus der Region der Sterne der Ungläubigen. Ich habe dort Handelspartner. Sowohl die Partner als auch die Fracht entstammen, sagen wir, einer Kultur, die der Menschheit fremd ist ..."

languages.text: « On vous a déjà dit que vous aviez un regard particulièrement perçant ? » {n}Le sourire de Jae disparaît.{/n} « Bref, shereen... ce chargement est très précieux à mes yeux parce qu'il vient de loin... de la région des Étoiles Athées. Il m'a été envoyé par des partenaires commerciaux qui, tout comme ces marchandises, sont... comment dirais-je ? D'une culture étrangère à l'humanité... »
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: « On vous a déjà dit que vous aviez un regard particulièrement perçant ? » {n}Le sourire de Jae disparaît.{/n} « Bref, shereen... ce chargement est très précieux à mes yeux parce qu'il vient de loin... de la région des Étoiles Athées. Il m'a été envoyé par des partenaires commerciaux qui, tout comme ces marchandises, sont... comment dirais-je ? D'une culture étrangère à l'humanité... »

languages.text: "Sana inanılmaz delici bakışların olduğunu söyleyen oldu mu hiç?" {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi kayboluyor.{/n} "Şey şirinim... Bu kargo benim için özellikle değerli çünkü uzaktan, Küffar Yıldızlar bölgesinden geldi. Uzaktaki ticaret ortaklarım yolladı. Hem ortaklarım hem de mallar... Şöyle diyeyim, İnsanlığa yabancı bir kültüre ait."
languages.original_text: "Has anyone ever told you you have an incredibly piercing gaze?" {n}Jae's smile fades.{/n} "Well, shereen. This cargo is particularly valuable to me because it came from afar — from the Heathen Stars region. From distant trade partners of mine. Both the partners and the cargo are, shall we say, of a culture that is foreign to Humanity—"

traits.locale_text: "Sana hiç inanılmaz delici bir bakışın olduğunu söyleyen oldu mu?" {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi kayboluyor.{/n} "Şey şirinim... Bu kargo benim için özellikle değerli çünkü uzaktan, Küffar Yıldızlar bölgesinden geldi, uzaktaki ticaret ortaklarımdan. Hem ortaklar hem de yük... Şöyle diyeyim, İnsanlığa yabancı bir kültüre ait."
